price: Watadumu humo milele. Hawampati mlinzi wala wa kuwanusuru.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا
footnotes: Hawatatoka humo kabisa. Hawatampata wa kuchukua dhamana ya kuwahami, wala wa kuwatetea.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
